Your Stamina deteriorates if you exert yourself without recharging. Your maximum HP and MP shrinks, and you suffer a penalty to critical hits.

Getting fully recharged will get you back into fighting shape.

To recharge, stand next to a campfire until your Stamina fully recovers. Don't forget to use firewood to extend the life of your campfire, and charms to provide you with extra bonuses!
